name: Bold the Options Menu Item
description:
Bolds the "Options..." menu item from the Tools menu.  
Increases the readability and menu navigation of the important option menu.
Another simple, but very useful style.
Works for Firefox 2 & Firefox 3


Browser Versions Supported:
+ Works on Firefox3
+ Works on Firefox2


Changelog:
1.0.0.1:
+ Added Support for Mac Operating Systems and Linux as well
+ They use Edit / Preferences instead.
